attributes.action: Reduce the speed limit on A road dual carriageways
attributes.additional_details:
Please reduce the speed limits  on our trunk A roads,  which although being dual carriageways,  are statistically not as safe  as our Motorways.

Most  of these  dual carriageways   ( or Expressways)   do not have a hard shoulder   and do not have SOS telephones at one mile intervals.

In addition  to lowering the speed limit,  please also  ban  slow agricultural vehicles  towing overloaded trailers.

Additionally  please prohibit Learner drivers from these roads
